Package org.apache.spark.shuffle.sort.io

package org.apache.spark.shuffle.sort.io
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.spark.shuffle.sort
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LocalDiskShuffleDataIO
    Implementation of the ShuffleDataIO plugin system that replicates the local shuffle storage and index file functionality that has historically been used from Spark 2.4 and earlier.
    LocalDiskShuffleDriverComponents
     
    LocalDiskShuffleExecutorComponents
     
    LocalDiskShuffleMapOutputWriter
    Implementation of ShuffleMapOutputWriter that replicates the functionality of shuffle persisting shuffle data to local disk alongside index files, identical to Spark's historic canonical shuffle storage mechanism.
    LocalDiskSingleSpillMapOutputWriter
